website_summaries.verdict: Elegant serving tray with a beautiful clear wood finish. Perfect for individual dinners or parties where the dinnerware needs to stand out.
pros: Ottoman design helps to keep plates and food squarely on the plate when carrying the tray
cons: Bamboo can chip and splinter if the finish wears down from heavy use

customer_reviews.title: Great Tray, good company!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered was cracked.... but, before I could return it the owner sent me an e-mail asking if I was happy with the tray.... I said NO! She apologized and told me she would send another immediately....the new one came it two days and it is wonderful! Really pretty, perfect size, looks great! I own my own company and this is the way to run a company.... I am going to see what other products she has.... class act and great product!
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyK

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well-functioning small dinner or tea tray
customer_reviews.text: This nicely built, simple tray was a good buy. It fits (barely) one dinner plate with space for a glass and / or small condiment dishes.
customer_reviews.author: CAT Lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough for a wedding present. It has a beautiful shape and is well crafted. I'm going to add a Plexiglas liner so they can add pictures to decorate the tray and change them as their life changes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mochel

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This tray works great. I purchased it to put on top of my ottoman for drinks and it is wonderful. Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: I like it but its use is limited
customer_reviews.text: I like it but its use is limited. Not wide enough to fit a normal size dinner plate on.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart easily
customer_reviews.text: These trays R cheaply made. They fall apart too easily & too soon. If they were stronger, they'd b fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: bj

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, good price
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, well made, easy to carry. Interior is not large enough to hold my standard dinner plate, but great for drinks, desserts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: ElaineSharon

customer_reviews.title: Great Tray
customer_reviews.text: Size is perfect and I painted it teal to use a coffee table accent.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M. Salerno

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came cracked all the way through the grain and I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Blah di blah

customer_reviews.title: and works nicely holding my tea set on my table
customer_reviews.text: This tray is well made, and works nicely holding my tea set on my table. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyfla

customer_reviews.title: Great Tray
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made all bamboo tray. I would recommend this tray to anyone. It will be used a lot with a silicone trivet to keep my plate and coffee from sliding around.
customer_reviews.author: DBA

customer_reviews.title: Liked initially, but split after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this tray when it arrived, but after about four months and not very heavy use a section of wood seems to have warped and the tray has split. Still usable I suppose, but disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product and excellent customer service. Smaller than expected for my use but very good quality. Sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in the product
customer_reviews.text: There is a separation in the wood right down the middle of the tray. I am very disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tray is beautifully finished and perfect for all occasions!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. So helpful since I have to ear in bed a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amber J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wood was warped
customer_reviews.text: The center wood panel on the base was warped when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice tray - I just wish it was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice tray - I just wish it was a little larger so I could more easily fit my dinner, glass, etc onto it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Practical Bamboo Tray (not too large)
customer_reviews.text: The five stars of my review are for my 2nd tray. The first tray I received had a split in the wood right down the middle of the tray and I was very disappointed but I received an email from the company asking me how I liked their product and I was honest. I was so pleased when they sent me another tray (at their insistence) and it's perfect! No split in the wood! I am very happy with my new tray and I'm very satisfied with the company service.
customer_reviews.author: SaturnCeleste

customer_reviews.title: Serving Tray and a whole lot more!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my stars I love these trays. Real high quality and so many ways to use. This supplier and product gets five stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Pat J. Swartzendruber

customer_reviews.title: Great Tray!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a tray for my living room for the longest. This tray is solid and fits my home quite nicely. I love the side handle design as well.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Many people complained about not being able to remove a sticker on the tray. There was no sticker on my tray. Further, the tray is very well made and quite lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: There was a light mark that looked like a water stain on one half of the tray ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall high quality for the price. There was a light mark that looked like a water stain on one half of the tray though... For me this didn't matter as I'm using it as an organizer in my bathroom, but may be more bothersome if displayed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome. Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. Very high quality. Bamboo wood is superior to the cheap metal trays. These clean up very nicely. The cheaper ones are a PITA to keep clean and looking nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality! I love the size - easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality! I love the size - easy to tote around. I wish I had bought this years ago!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little tray for my needs-strong and well-made but not imposing.
customer_reviews.author: L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty tray. The bamboo is very nice. Have used it several times already. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Clean design, solidly built, easy to clean - all things a tray needs, and a nice smallish size. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Peck

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the tray but it was broken when I received it. I got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Nice tray, Good size for a couple of cups of coffee or drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this for a gift for my mom and she loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my mom and she loved it!! Very nice bamboo serving tray!
customer_reviews.author: VANDANA

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sturdy and nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, sturdy and nice. Use it to take food from upstairs to downstairs. Holds teapot, mug and saucer nicely.
customer_reviews.author: WKL

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received the product with a giant crack down the middle of the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Lushine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These crack easily and leak like crazy. It works best if you line them with foil.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Roberts

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRAY! I've been needing one for quite sometime ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT TRAY! I've been needing one for quite sometime and this one is perfect. Super sturdy, roomy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tenaj

customer_reviews.title: very well made, attractive
customer_reviews.text: a beautiful tray, well made. We use it to serve drinks and snacks.
customer_reviews.author: C. SHI

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this tray to sit on my refurbished ottoman ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tray to sit on my refurbished ottoman to use as a coffee table. It's exactly what I wanted and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bamboo tray
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous bamboo tray. Very high quality and has a beautiful, elegant design. Perfect for carrying tea or a meal to another room. Love the cut out on each side of tray that creates a handle and makes the tray easier to carry and less likely to drop. Cleans up easily and so far has not stained. The bamboo is lovely and I leave these trays out so I can see them all the time. Originally bought one but liked it so much I purchased a second. I find myself using these trays all the time and I love them. Has definitely increased the joy and comfort factor in my home. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: really great tray, I use this to serve my wife ...
customer_reviews.text: really great tray, I use this to serve my wife her tea. It fits a two cup tea pot, creamer, sugar bowl, and two cups and saucers. There is also enough room for small flower vase. For those of you needing to score points this item will help.
customer_reviews.author: J. Galon

customer_reviews.title: ... than what I expected but the quality was very good so I decided to keep it
customer_reviews.text: This product ended up being smaller than what I expected but the quality was very good so I decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin DeLu

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Tray
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than we thought that it was going to be, but it is doing the job that we bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: These are serving trays not to be confused with TV trays.
customer_reviews.text: These trays are not big enough for a dinner plate. I returned them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Search

product_meta.title: SB Trays Bamboo Serving Tray w/Handles: Serve food, coffee or tea, or use as a party platter; decorative rectangular ottoman tray
